title: Beijing Begins Apparent Corruption Probe Into High-Level Official
teaser: China has begun investigations into one of the country's senior politicians. Zhou Yongkang was a former domestic security chief, and he's suspected of "serious disciplinary violations."
contentencoded:
China has begun investigations into one of the country's senior politicians. Zhou Yongkang was a former domestic security chief, and he's suspected of "serious disciplinary violations" â€” a phrase which usually stands for corruption.
